title: Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Business: Release date, price, and everything you need to know
content:
Samsung recently introduced a bunch of new premium lightweight ultrabooks under its Galaxy Book 2 and Galaxy Book 2 Pro series. In addition to these premium notebooks in the series, the company also announced the Galaxy Book 2 Business, which is noticeably different from the other laptops in the lineup with different specs. The Samsung

The post Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Business: Release date, price, and everything you need to know appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Business is a part of Samsung's new Book 2 series. Here's everything we know about this notebook.
